props.name: model
props.description: The model that the input value syncs to

props.name: id
props.description: A unique identifier for the input

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute of the <input> or <textarea>

props.name: disabled
props.description: Indicates whether the user can interact with the element

props.name: maxlength
props.description: The maximum allowed length of input

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Provides a hint to the user of what can be entered in the field

props.name: pattern
props.description: Defines a regular expression which the element's value will be validated against

props.name: label
props.description: The label shown above the input

props.name: error
props.description: The help text (hint) shown to the user below the input

props.name: plus
props.description: Defines a extra span as an expandable text field container

props.name: expand
props.description: Defines a expand div as an autocomplete field container

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The label slot holds the label or icon and can contain HTML

slots.name: error
slots.description: The error slot holds the error text and can contain HTML

slots.name: plus
slots.description: The plus slot holds the plus text and can contain HTML

slots.name: expand
slots.description: The expand slot holds the autocomplete text and can contain HTML

events.name: focus
events.description: Emitted when the textbox is focused.

events.name: blur
events.description: Emitted when the textbox loses focus.

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted when the select value is changed. The handler is called with the new value. (IE10+)

events.name: change (Deprecated)
events.description: Emitted when a change in the textbox value is committed. The handler is called with the new value. (IE9+)

events.name: keydown
events.description: Emitted when a key is pressed in the input. The handler is called with the event object.

events.name: enter
events.description: Emitted when the Enter key is pressed in the input. The handler is called with the event object.
